channel.title: Indigos - Opposed Sense (317) All 25 skills / mini games / staff needed
channel.description:
[color=navy][CENTER][IMG]http://indigosps.com/tpl/design/img/logo.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zLhDslW.png[/img][/CENTER] [CENTER]Hello. Welcome to our advertisement! Are you looking for a game wich is packed with fun and unique content and that is updated regularly? Then you have come to the right place!. Here at Indigos, we mix our content to make sure that our players receive the best gameplay experience possible. Our server is completely written from scratch by our talented developers and that is why we can guarantee you 100% uptime 24/7. Our dedicated developers also guarantee regular updates for tons of fun!, so what are you waiting for? Come and join us!
[SIZE=4][CENTER][URL=http://indigosps.com]|ACCESS OUR WEBSITE BY CLICKING HERE |[/URL][/CENTER]
[SIZE=4][CENTER][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26092372/Indigos%20v2.1.jar"]|DOWNLOAD OUR CLIENT BY CLICKING HERE |[/URL][/CENTER]
IndigosPS is hosted and developed by the Indigos team. We are a non-profitable community with the desire to learn day by day the JAVA code while making a bunch of friends in the path. Step aside RSPS! Indigos has come to stay :), feel free to support us!. [CENTER]| BRIDDING | PK | ECO | 24/7 | DICING | CHAOTICS | SKILLS | MORE! |[/CENTER]
[B][I]Some notable features: [/I][/B] - 0 dupes, and no I'm not saying that with my head up my ass, it actually has 0 dupes. - Controlled Force Teleporting 100% fixed thanks to my Locations system. - WPE 100% fixed, people can not manipulate packets. Server is extremely safe. - All data read from JSON. - Nice MySQL system. - 100+ achievements. - 100% Clanchat system with ranks. - pets!.. - Real RS Grand Exchange system. - All skills added, even Dungeoneering with parties/complexity. - Full bank system with searching, tabs and all that crap. - 15+ bosses, including 100% Nex and Kalphite Queens with stages etc. - Very advanced client, unique cache downloading system. - Multi-threaded server, a "logic thread" which handles asynchronous operations such as file writing. - Actually runs 24/7 without any disconnection or crash issues. - And so much more... Download and see for yourself![/CENTER]
[size=40pt][color=red][center]--MEDIA--[/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/mzE03UN.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://imgur.com/qoCiHcH.jpg[/img][/center]
server updated today (20/11/2015).

item.title: Indigos - Opposed Sense (317) All 25 skills / mini games / staff needed

item.description:
@Indigorsps wrote:

[color=navy][CENTER]

[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Hello. Welcome to our advertisement! Are you looking for a game wich is packed with fun and unique content and that is updated regularly?
Then you have come to the right place!. Here at Indigos, we mix our content to make sure that our players receive the best gameplay experience possible. Our server
is completely written from scratch by our talented developers and that is why we can guarantee you 100% uptime 24/7. Our dedicated developers also guarantee
regular updates for tons of fun!, so what are you waiting for? Come and join us!

[SIZE=4][CENTER]|ACCESS OUR WEBSITE BY CLICKING HERE |[/CENTER]

[SIZE=4][CENTER]|DOWNLOAD OUR CLIENT BY CLICKING HERE |[/CENTER]

IndigosPS is hosted and developed by the Indigos team. We are a non-profitable community with the desire to learn day by day the JAVA code while making a bunch of
friends in the path. Step aside RSPS! Indigos has come to stay :), feel free to support us!.
[CENTER]| BRIDDING | PK | ECO | 24/7 | DICING | CHAOTICS | SKILLS | MORE! |[/CENTER]

Some notable features:

  • 0 dupes, and no I’m not saying that with my head up my ass, it actually has 0 dupes.
  • Controlled Force Teleporting 100% fixed thanks to my Locations system.
  • WPE 100% fixed, people can not manipulate packets. Server is extremely safe.
  • All data read from JSON.
  • Nice MySQL system.
  • 100+ achievements.
  • 100% Clanchat system with ranks.
  • pets!..
  • Real RS Grand Exchange system.
    • All skills added, even Dungeoneering with parties/complexity.
    • Full bank system with searching, tabs and all that crap.
    • 15+ bosses, including 100% Nex and Kalphite Queens with stages etc.
    • Very advanced client, unique cache downloading system.
    • Multi-threaded server, a “logic thread” which handles asynchronous operations such as file writing.
    • Actually runs 24/7 without any disconnection or crash issues.
    • And so much more… Download and see for yourself![/CENTER]

[size=40pt][color=red][center]–MEDIA–[/center]
[center][/center]
[center]

[/center]
